# clean-dev-dirs ${GITHUB_REF#refs/tags/v}

## Installation

### Via Cargo (recommended)
```bash
cargo install clean-dev-dirs
```

### Via Homebrew
```bash
brew install TomPlanche/clean-dev-dirs/clean-dev-dirs
```

### Via Binary Download
Download the appropriate binary for your system from the assets below and extract it to a directory in your PATH.

## Supported Platforms
- Linux (x86_64)
- macOS (Intel x86_64)
- macOS (Apple Silicon arm64)

## SHA256 Checksums
_Will be added during release process_
